Item.Name: KEYBLCK_AIDY_CODE
Item.Hint: Aid Year Code; press LIST for valid codes

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
R$_SEL_ROBINST_DESC_STATUS( :KEYBLCK_AIDY_CODE,
 'ROBINST_AIDY_DESC',
 :STATUS_IND );
/*
 IF :ROBINST_AIDY_DESC IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('RPRAUDT-0009', 'FORM','*ERROR* Invalid Aid Year code; press LIST for valid codes.') 
 );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF ;
*/
null;

Item.Name: RZRCREQ_PROGRAM
Item.Hint: Program Code; press LIST for valid codes.

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 G$_CHECK_QUERY_MODE ;
--
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SMRPRLE_PROGRAM
 FROM SMRPRLE
 WHERE SMRPRLE_PROGRAM = :RZRCREQ.RZRCREQ_PROGRAM ;
 
 DESC_HOLD VARCHAR2(255) ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO DESC_HOLD ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%NOTFOUND,
 '*ERROR* Invalid Program.', TRUE);
--crr '*ERROR* Invalid Program; press LIST for valid codes.', TRUE);
 END ;
--
END ;

Trigger.Name: KEYLISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- THIS TRIGGER WAS CODED INSTEAD OF THE STANDARD CALL TO G$_DISPLAY_LOV
-- BECAUSE THE G$ ROUTINE WAS NOT FUNCTIONING PROPERLY FOR THIS ITEM DUE
-- TO DUPLICATE RORAUDT_GMOD_CODE ITEMS IN THE COPY_BLOCK AND THE RORAUDT
-- BLOCK.
--
NULL ;
/*
GO_ITEM('RORAUDT.RORAUDT_GMOD_CODE');
SET_LOV_PROPERTY('STVGMOD_LOV',LOV_SIZE,39,10);
IF SHOW_LOV('STVGMOD_LOV',39,10) THEN
 :RORAUDT.RORAUDT_GMOD_CODE := :GLOBAL.VALUE;
 DO_KEY('NEXT_ITEM');
END IF;
*/

Item.Name: RZRCREQ_CREDITS
Item.Hint: Credits required to graduate from program.

Item.Name: RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE
Item.Hint: Copy to Aid Year; press LIST for valid codes

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- CNMCCWR# AMueller modified for program lengths
BEGIN
 G$_CHECK_QUERY_MODE ;
--
 R$_SEL_ROBINST_DESC_STATUS( :COPY_BLOCK.RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE,
 'RZRCREQ_AIDY_DESC',
 :COPY_STATUS_IND );
 IF :RZRCREQ_AIDY_DESC IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('RPRAUDT-0018', 'FORM','*ERROR* Invalid Aid Year code; press LIST for valid codes.') 
 );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF ;
--
 IF :COPY_STATUS_IND = 'I' THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('RPRAUDT-0019', 'FORM','*WARNING* Inactive Aid Year; no changes/additions to data allowed') 
 ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF ;
--
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE THEN
 :GLOBAL.QUERY_MODE := '0' ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
END ;

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- THIS TRIGGER WAS CODED INSTEAD OF THE STANDARD CALL TO G$_DISPLAY_LOV
-- BECAUSE THE G$ ROUTINE WAS NOT FUNCTIONING PROPERLY FOR THIS ITEM DUE
-- TO DUPLICATE RORAUDT_AIDY_CODE ITEMS IN THE COPY_BLOCK AND THE RORAUDT
-- BLOCK.
--
-- CNMCCWR# AMueller modified for program lengths
GO_ITEM('COPY_BLOCK.RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE');
--40-1
--SET_LOV_PROPERTY('ROIAIDY_LOV',LOV_SIZE,39,10);
--IF SHOW_LOV('ROIAIDY_LOV',39,10) THEN
SET_LOV_PROPERTY('ROIAIDY_LOV',LOV_SIZE,243,170);
IF SHOW_LOV('ROIAIDY_LOV',234,170) THEN
 :COPY_BLOCK.RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE := :GLOBAL.VALUE;
 DO_KEY('NEXT_ITEM');
END IF;

Trigger.Name: PRE-BLOCK
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- CNMCCWR# AMueller modified for program lengths
 :COPY_BLOCK_MSG := '** Press INSERT RECORD or COPY button to copy Program Lengths **' ;

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- CNMCCWR# AMueller modified for program lengths
 IF G$_NCHK(G$_NCHK(:KEY_CREREC_IND <> 'Y')) THEN
 MESSAGE( '*ERROR* Press INSERT RECORD to copy Program Lengths; REMOVE RECORD to void copy') ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
/* CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM RORAUDT
 WHERE RORAUDT_AIDY_CODE =
 :COPY_BLOCK.RORAUDT_AIDY_CODE ; */
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM RZRCREQ
 WHERE RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE =
 :COPY_BLOCK.RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%FOUND,
 '*ERROR* Aid Year already has program lengths, copy not allowed' , TRUE);
 END ;

Trigger.Name: POST-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- CNMCCWR# AMueller modified for program lengths
--
 DELETE FROM RZRCREQ
 WHERE RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE = :COPY_BLOCK.RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (SQL%NOTFOUND,NULL, TRUE);
--
 INSERT INTO RZRCREQ ( RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE,
 RZRCREQ_PROGRAM,
 RZRCREQ_CREDITS,
 RZRCREQ_MTF,
 RZRCREQ_ACTIVITY_DATE,
 RZRCREQ_DATA_ORIGIN,
 RZRCREQ_USER_ID )
 SELECT :COPY_BLOCK.RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE, RZRCREQ_PROGRAM,
 RZRCREQ_CREDITS, RZRCREQ_MTF, SYSDATE, RZRCREQ_DATA_ORIGIN,
 :GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER 
 FROM RZRCREQ
 WHERE RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE = :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_AIDY_CODE ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (SQL%NOTFOUND, NULL, TRUE);

Trigger.Name: KEY-CREREC
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- CNMCCWR# AMueller modified for program lengths
 :KEY_CREREC_IND := 'Y' ;
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := '5' ;
 COMMIT_FORM ;
 IF NOT FORM_SUCCESS THEN
 GOTO COMMIT_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 GOTO COMMIT_SUCCESS ;
--
 << COMMIT_FAILURE >>
 :KEY_CREREC_IND := 'N' ;
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := '0' ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
--
 << COMMIT_SUCCESS >>
 :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_AIDY_CODE := :COPY_BLOCK.RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE ;
 CLEAR_BLOCK ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('ENABLE_KEYS');
 GO_BLOCK( 'KEY_BLOCK' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :SYSTEM.CURSOR_BLOCK = 'COPY_BLOCK' THEN
 NULL;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('RPRAUDT-0022', 'FORM','Button is outside the current block') );
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF;
 :KEY_CREREC_IND := 'Y' ;
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := '5' ;
 COMMIT_FORM ;
 IF NOT FORM_SUCCESS THEN
 GOTO COMMIT_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
 GOTO COMMIT_SUCCESS ;
--
 << COMMIT_FAILURE >>
 :KEY_CREREC_IND := 'N' ;
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL := '0' ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
--
 << COMMIT_SUCCESS >>
 :KEY_BLOCK.KEYBLCK_AIDY_CODE := :COPY_BLOCK.RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE;
 CLEAR_BLOCK ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('ENABLE_KEYS');
 GO_BLOCK( 'KEY_BLOCK' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_3_0_B2K
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_3_0_B2K IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 3.0 INIT DATE
1. Enhancements for Banner2000 upgrade. These include SQ 01/01/97
 adding an object group which contains the objects for
 the toolbar, adding an object group which highlights
 the active record within a block, a mouse-doubleclick
 and when-timer-expired trigger at the form level and
 this audit trail.
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_3_0
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_3_0 IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 3.3
1. Regenerate to pick up y2k changes in SOQOLIB. AR /4/23/98
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0_B2K
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0_B2K IS
/*
AUDIT TRAIL: 4.0
1. VM 08/20/98
 Enhancements for Banner2000 4.0 upgrade. These include replacing the toolbar
 object group which contains the new horizontal and vertical toolbars, the 
 navigational frame. Also changes the coordinate system to REAL and resizes
 the windows and canvases. Changes to name visual attributes, many new property
 classes and reduced number of redundant triggers. See the General 4.0 TRM 
 for more details.
AUDIT TRAIL END
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_4_0 IS
/*
1.AUDIT TRAIL: 4.1
1. Remove references to banicon.dll VM 03-08-99

AUDIT TRAIL END;
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_7_0_FORMSCNV IS 
/* 
AUDIT TRAIL: 7.0 FORMSCNV 
1. Michael Hitrik 01/30/2004 
 Auto conversion of UI enhancements. Refer to the General UI documentation for more details. 
AUDIT TRAIL END 
*/

 NULL; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_7_0
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_7_0 IS
/* 
AUDIT TRAIL: 7.0
1. RK 06/02/2004
 Removed blck menu. 
2. Gladys Rocher 06/29/2004
 Application of enhanced UI methodology.
 Please refer to the SCT Banner 7.0 User Interface Technical Methodology for more details. 

AUDIT TRAIL: 7.1
1. RK 10/26/2004
 Reset BUTTON_CONTROL_BLOCK COPY_BTN Property Class inrder to set the Iconic Button
 to the right size.
AUDIT TRAIL: 7.5
1. HW 01/17/2006
 Removed all SYN CHRONIZE statements from form. They were unnecessary and caused additional
 system overhead. Modified triggers PRE-INSERT and PRE-UPDATE triggers.
AUDIT TRAIL END 
*/ 
BEGIN 
 NULL; 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_NLS_DATE_SUPPORT
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_NLS_DATE_SUPPORT IS
-- AUDIT TRAIL: NLS_DATE_SUPPORT 
-- 1. TGKinderman 11/11/2005
-- This object was passed through a conversion process relative to preparing
-- the object to support internationalization needs. Basically, hard coded
-- date format masks of DD-MON-YYYY are converted to a G$_DATE function that
-- returns nls_date_format. The release number of this object was NOT
-- modified as part of this effort. This object may or may not have had 
-- conversion process code modifications. However, this audit trail entry
-- does indicate that the object has been passed through the conversion.
-- AUDIT TRAIL END
-- 
BEGIN
 NULL;
END AUDIT_TRAIL_NLS_DATE_SUPPORT;

ProgramUnit.Name: AUDIT_TRAIL_RZRCREQ_CCHP_IND
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE AUDIT_TRAIL_RZRCREQ_CCHP_IND IS
/* AUDIT TRAIL - CNMCCWR#3570 - LVarnedoe 26-OCT-09
 Added an additional column, RZRCREQ_CCHP_IND (Credit Clock Hour Program Indicator),
 to the RZRCREQ table. This appears as a check box on the form. It will allow the 
 credit clock hour programs to be identified by their name and the aidy year. Originally,
 these were identified only by the major code. This was causing problems because certain 
 certificates and degrees have the same code.
 END AUDIT TRAIL
*/
BEGIN
 NULL; 
END AUDIT_TRAIL_RZRCREQ_CCHP_IND;

Trigger.Name: WHEN_NEW_BLOCK_INSTANCE_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CHECK_KEYS = 'Y' THEN
 :WORK_BLOCK_ITEM := :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK || '.' || :SYSTEM.CURRENT_ITEM;
 GO_BLOCK('KEY_BLOCK');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('DISABLE_KEYS');
 :CHECK_KEYS := 'N';
 IF :WORK_BLOCK_ITEM IS NOT NULL THEN
 GO_ITEM(:WORK_BLOCK_ITEM);
 END IF;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: MENU_TRIGGER
Trigger.TriggerText:
/*******************************************
 Code modified by the Forms Migration Assistant
 20-Nov-2003 09:40 PM
 *******************************************/

 IF :SYSTEM.CURRENT_BLOCK = 'KEY_BLOCK' THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CLR_FORM' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: CLR_FORM
Trigger.TriggerText:
:GLOBAL.AIDY_CODE := :KEYBLCK_AIDY_CODE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('ENABLE_KEYS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 CLEAR_FORM ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 R$_LOAD_FORM_HEADER;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 :KEYBLCK_AIDY_CODE := :GLOBAL.AIDY_CODE ;
 NEXT_FIELD ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :KEYBLCK_AIDY_CODE IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGE( G$_NLS.Get('RPRAUDT-0004', 'FORM','*ERROR* Key Block field must have a value') ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 ELSE
 NULL ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_AIDY_STAT
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF G$_NCHK(G$_NCHK(:STATUS_IND <> 'A')) THEN
 MESSAGE(
 G$_NLS.Get('RPRAUDT-0005', 'FORM','*WARNING* Inactive Aid Year; No changes/additions to data allowed') ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-FORM-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
R$_LOAD_FORM_HEADER;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 :KEYBLCK_AIDY_CODE := :GLOBAL.AIDY_CODE ;
 NEXT_ITEM ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 G$_SET_INST_PROPERTY;
 G$_SET_WIN_PROPERTY;

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 PTI_INTO_TEMP VARCHAR2(255);
 CURSOR PTI_CURSOR IS
 SELECT 'X'
 FROM RZRCREQ
 WHERE RZRCREQ_AIDY_CODE = :KEYBLCK_AIDY_CODE
 AND RZRCREQ_PROGRAM = :RZRCREQ.RZRCREQ_PROGRAM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PTI_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PTI_CURSOR INTO PTI_INTO_TEMP ;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (PTI_CURSOR%FOUND,
 '*WARNING* Program already exists for Aid Year; not added', TRUE) ;
 END ;
 :RZRCREQ.RZRCREQ_ACTIVITY_DATE := TO_DATE(:CURRENT_DATE,G$_DATE.GET_NLS_DATE_FORMAT);
 :RZRCREQ.RZRCREQ_USER_ID := :GLOBAL.CURRENT_USER;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
